short_summary: Two automated sample dilution stations along with peripherals are required
description: The procurement involves the delivery and installation of two (2) automated sample dilution stations required by Natural Resources Canada. Laboratories may submit their bids for this contract. The automated sample dilution stations must be able to handle various types of samples and analyze them at high temperatures. Furthermore, a watering system that is interconnected with the water supply system of the location should be available, as well as communications inter-networking for processing and interaction. Suppliers who do not have the required licenses may not participate in this project. The supply arrangement can be made only on the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and  there is a total requirement for 2 lots for the contract over a period of two years. Public Works and Government Services Canada is responsible for managing the appeals and complaints procedures regarding any issues and Public Works and Government Services Canada should be contacted for further information
